import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Student} from "../../model/Student"; @Component({ selector: 'app-student-form-data', templateUrl: './student-form-data.component.html', styleUrls: ['./student-form-data.component.css'] }) export class StudentFormDataComponent { students: Student[] = [] constructor() { this.students.push(new Student('S001', 'Luffy', "Maths")) this.students.push(new Student('S002', 'Zoro', "Science")) this.students.push(new Student('S003', 'Nami', "Geography")) } }
